description: This is a unit test source file for a Tetris game engine, containing tests that verify deterministic RNG, game initialization, movement, rotation, hard drop, line clearing, and hold functionalities.

classes.name: GameEngineUnitTest
classes.description: A test suite for verifying the functionality of the Tetris game engine and related components.

methods.name: sevenBag_isDeterministic
methods.description: Tests that the SevenBagRNG produces a deterministic sequence given the same seed.

methods.name: engine_initializesWithActivePiece
methods.description: Verifies that a new game engine instance initializes with an active piece, correct board dimensions, and centered spawn position.

methods.name: movement_leftRight_noCollision_changesXWhenPossible
methods.description: Checks that moving left or right updates the active piece's X position if no collision occurs.

methods.name: rotation_attempt_appliesSRSOrStays
methods.description: Tests that rotating the piece either applies the rotation or stays the same if rotation isn't possible.

methods.name: hardDrop_locksAndSpawnsNewPiece
methods.description: Ensures that a hard drop locks the piece, increases score, and spawns a new piece at the correct position.

methods.name: lineClear_scoresAndLevels
methods.description: Verifies that clearing a line updates score and level appropriately after multiple hard drops.

methods.name: hold_swapsPieces_andPreventsConsecutiveHold
methods.description: Tests hold functionality, confirming it swaps pieces, prevents immediate consecutive holds, and resets spawn position.
